Class BadActionRequestException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • uk.ac.brighton.uni.ab607.mmorpg.server.BadActionRequestException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BadActionRequestException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This exception is raised when there is something wrong with the action requested by game client Possible causes: wrong data format, invalid values
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (ab607@uni.brighton.ac.uk)
